title: Ironman and Olympic Tri Annihilator Kristian Blummenfelt Has an Audacious Plan to Win the Tour de France
content:
'We don't go cycling to retire. We go to make a difference': Norwegian megastar's trainer outlines plans to win the Tour in 2028 amid rumors of deal with Jayco-AlUla.

Read the full article at Ironman and Olympic Tri Annihilator Kristian Blummenfelt Has an Audacious Plan to Win the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
